alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 09 at 3:58PM CDT until April 09 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... West central Wilbarger County in northern Texas... Southern Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 358 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of Quanah, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Quanah, Chillicothe, and Medicine Mound. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
